name: Tabletop Role Playing Game
description:
Ear, Fur, & Bone is a competitive map-labeling RPG that is set in a mysterious forest, you will choose a faction to build influence and gain power by exploring the forest and collecting natural resources.

I chose BFB as my based game system as I really like storytelling games and its system is pretty straightforward, which is easy for me to understand and recreate. My original idea was to create a game that can let players play with their friends and explore some kind of unknown, so I set the game in a mysterious forest.
